reviews.review: to underrated

Ce jeu à été l'un de mes FPS préférés de l'époque ! 
Pour résumer court, c'est VALVE, et c'est un counter-strike mais à l'époque de la seconde guerre mondiale.
Malheureusement toujours pas de suite à ce jour faute de popularité à l'époque de sa sortie.

Je voulais quand même le recommander, et le remercier de m'avoir fait passer d'excellents moments pendant 1,630 heures de ma vie.
The best.

Bit dated but fun with a team of friends on a closed server, the online community these days is a bit patchy and seems to be certain demographics that make it a bit hard to communicate with on my behalf, I prefer the  Battlefield 19XX series when it comes to WW2 multiplayer FPS games.

150 g de maicena
100 g de harina 0000
80 g de azúcar
100 g de manteca
2 yemas
1 cucharadita de polvo para hornear
esencia de vainilla
dulce de leche
coco rallado

Como hacer alfajores de maicena paso a paso

1-En un bol de su preferencia, vamos a poner la manteca (a temperatura ambiente), el azúcar y unas gotitas de escencia de vainilla. Vamos a mezclar todo hasta que esté bien incorporado. Pueden utilizar una batidora eléctrica o hacerlo a mano.

2-Una vez que tengamos armada una especie de pomada, vamos a agregar las dos yemas de huevo y vamos a volver a batir.

3-Llegó el momento de incorporar la harina y nuestra protagonista, la maicena. Si pueden hacerlo con un tamizado de por medio, mucho mejor. También vamos a agregar una pizca de polvo para hornear.

4-Ahora sí, vamos a meter mano en el asunto. En el bol hasta que los ingredientes secos esté bastante incorporados con los húmedos y luego vamos a continuar en la mesada hasta que nos quede una masa bien homogénea.

5-Vamos a dejar reposar nuestra masa unos 15 minutos aproximadamente.

6-Pasado este tiempo, vamos a pasar al estirado de la masa. Para eso vamos a utilizar lo que en este canal nos gusta llamar: La técnica de los capos consiste en lo siguiente: Vamos a estirar una buena cantidad de papel film sobre la mesada. Por encima, colocamos nuestro bollo y luego por encima otra buena cantidad de papel film. Así, entre estas dos láminas, vamos a proceder a aplastar y estirar nuestra masa. Primero con las manos y luego con el palo de amasar hasta que esté bastante chatita.

7-Retiramos la parte de arriba del film y con un cortante redondo (también pueden usar cosas similares como un vaso) procedemos a armar nuestras tapitas y a medida que lo vamos haciendo, las vamos colocando en un recipiente para horno. Tengan mucho cuidado al manipular las tapitas porque la masa es muy sensible y se pone a llorar por cualquier cosa. Van a ver que les sobra masa, en ese caso la vuelven a juntar, a estirar y así sacan más alfajores de maicena.

8-Antes de llevarlas al horno y mientras este se calienta, vamos a llevar la masa a la heladera unos minutos.

9-Pasado este tiempo, las llevamos al horno 180º por aproximadamente 10 minutos. Tengan en cuenta que la temperatura del horno es muy importante para que no queden demasiado secos.

10-Una vez que vean que las tapitas están doraditas, las vamos a sacar. Una vez que estén frías, armamos nuestros alfajores de maicena colocando dulce de leche repostero sobre una tapita y colocando otra por encima. Si lo desean, pueden agregarle el coco rallado por al rededor.

Best WWII multiplayer out there. Simple, no microtransactions.

밸브 컴플리트팩 사면서 끼워있던 거 잠깐 테스트하려다가 순식간에 10시간 넘게 플레이하였습니다. 오래된 게임임에도 게임성이 매우 훌륭해서 시간가는 줄 모르고 했습니다. 서버는 사람이 적긴 하지만 AI봇들이 잔뜩 모여있는 서버에 들어가서 AI봇들과 플레이해도 상당하 재미를 느낄 수 있었습니다. 도리어 AI봇들이라 핵쟁이가 없어서 그런지 간만에 정직한 플레이 분위기가 맘에 들었습니다. 퇴근시간 때 즉 저녁때 주로 접속하면 20명 이상 모여있는 방이 대여섯개는 있긴한데 단 고인물들의 향연이라 AI봇들을 상대할 때보다 몇배나 어렵다는 거 참고 바랍니다. 

오래된 게임인만큼 당연히 사양도 매우 낮아서 베이트레일급의 저사양 넷북 수준에서도 옵션 타협을 통해 플레이가 가능하다는 점도 장점입니다. 출장 자주 다니시는 분들중에 노트북으로 짬짬히 멀티FPS 간단히 즐기기에도 좋아 보입니다. 용량도 3.8기가 남짓되는데 하프라이프2 시절 나온 거 감안하면 생각보다 그래픽도 준수합니다.  

전혀 기대 안했음에도 즐겁게 한 게임인데 앞으로도 가끔 즐기게 될 게임일 것 같습니다.

I'm glad I found out about this game. I was hyped by many new WWII themed online multiplayer but all of them cost quite amount of money while this one. hehe. You could just say that Valve never fail when it comes to FPS. If you like any FPS Valve has made, then you'll like this one, especially if you like WWII. Maps are great, just like typical CS map with WWII touch. Class system and weapons are cool. I was surprised that there are still many people out there playing this game, although if you live somewhere in Asia it would be a little tough because you will have to play in non-Asia server since most server in Asia are empty.

We play this at all our lans. Because it is not widely played no one is a master at it. The maps are interesting and the gameplay makes you work together as a team. We have had great fun naming different structures where people are hiding ready to snipe you. Our most thoroughly enjoyed game

I used to play this when I was younger, it's still a fun game (yes, even with the mid age men who run the servers who think they're right about everything). Just don't play for too long- this game is draining on your soul if you don't play the braindead classes. Since the game has been left for dead for a very long time by Valve the hitboxes, netcode, everything about this game has and will never be changed/fixed in a loooong time, asides from there being not too many European servers you'll also get a ton of people with over 200 ping shooting you through walls constantly.
So yeah, have fun.
edit: holy shit how much did they fuck up riflemen in this game they're so useless compared to automatic weapons, man remember when dod 3.1 and release actually had it so automatic weapons were absolutely useless at range haha :)))))) oh of course most people that play this game dont because of the brainrot they have from playing those classes in the source version like jesus christ where is the FUCKING RECOIL
Good game, though the weapons are imbalanced, resulting in every primary gun except riflemans gun doing 1 shot kills. Holy shit that MG recoil when not mounted tho.

A classic masterpiece!

Day of Defeat: Source is a World War 2 themed shooter. You can play as the Axis or the Allied. There is a long range of diffrent weapons to use and a fair amount of maps.

Sadly this game got no official server like Team Fortress 2, so you need to play on community servers that sometimes got weird maps and other stuff.

It's a classic game, I wish more people played it and Valve maybe added official maps and new maps too! 8/10.

С: Товарищ прапорщик, правильно говорить: алюминий.
П: Повторяю сегодня вы будете помогать гражданским, а именно носить алюмин.
С: Товарищ прапорщик, я говорю, правильно говорить алюминий.
П: А самые умные будут носить чугуний.
